mapper.select:
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(course_num),0) FROM eg_user_studycard WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
AND type = #{param.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM eg_user_studycard WHERE course_num* 3 <= original_course_num* 2 AND type = 'mechanism_offline' AND settlement_one_third = FALSE

SELECT
FROM eg_user_studycard WHERE course_num* 3 <= original_course_num AND type = 'mechanism_offline' AND settlement_two_thirds = FALSE

SELECT
FROM eg_user_studycard WHERE course_num* 3 <= original_course_num AND type = 'mechanism_offline' AND settlement_all = FALSE
